Manga.title: Revenge of The Baskerville Bastard
Manga.description:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.,Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.
This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.
Manga.author: Kimari

Manga.title: Nano Machine
Manga.description: After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.
Manga.author: Hanjung Wolyang

Manga.title: Second Life Ranker
Manga.description: After finding his brother’s hidden diary in a mysterious pocket watch, Yeon‑woo enters the Tower of the Sun God to uncover the betrayal behind his death, aiming to become the top Ranker.
Manga.author: NongNong, Sadoyeon

Manga.title: Overgeared
Manga.description: Shin Youngwoo, an unlucky VR gamer, discovers a legendary blacksmith’s tome and becomes Grid—rising from debt‑ridden loser to top‑tier crafter and fighter in the world of Satisfy.
Manga.author: Park Saenal; Haban & Silverbin

Manga.title: The Return of the Disaster-Class Hero
Manga.description: After being the world’s greatest hero, Lee Geon is betrayed and killed—only to be reborn years later, stronger and bent on revenge, reclaiming his title and confronting old foes.
Manga.author: Redice Studio

Manga.title: Log Into the Future
Manga.description: Eun‑ju logs into a future VR world where time behaves differently—what seems like hours in-game is years in reality—and uses this to reshape his destiny.
Manga.author: Ace Ocean

Manga.title: Becoming the Monarch
Manga.description: In a world of cultivation, Mu‑yeon awakens as a cursed wanderer—and decides that becoming monarch is the only way to break his curse and avenge his past.
Manga.author: Nice‑Lee

Manga.title: The Swordmaster's Son
Manga.description: When the renowned Swordmaster's son is abused and cast aside, he regains power through a hidden legacy and begins a journey of vengeance and honor.
Manga.author: Jeon Geuk‑jin & Lee Chul‑jin

Manga.title: The Greatest Estate Developer
Manga.description: Park So‑ho uses modern knowledge and cultivation magic to turn wastelands into prosperous estates—evolving from renting tents to ruling realms.
Manga.author: ZeroLab & Hellper

Manga.title: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken
Manga.description: Satoru Mikami dies and reincarnates in a fantasy world as a slime, gaining unique abilities and forging a powerful nation as Rimuru Tempest.
Manga.author: Fuse; Taiki Kawakami

Manga.title: The Devil Never Cries
Manga.description: The reincarnation of the Demon King awakens in a new world determined to destroy all who shunned him—but a girl’s smile may change his brutal path.
Manga.author: 여물아

Manga.title: The Archmage's Restaurant
Manga.description: A legendary archmage opens a restaurant whose dishes contain magical effects—and clients seek power, healing, or curses along with their meals.
Manga.author: Ariel & Im Dal‑jae

Manga.title: The Max Level Hero Strikes Back
Manga.description: Once defeated but reborn stronger, Jude—the world’s most powerful hero—returns to settle his own score and protect those who doubted him.
Manga.author: Gonjang & Sinyoung

Manga.title: Spare Me, Great Lord!
Manga.description: A beast killer is reincarnated as a noble’s son—and chooses to pacify beasts rather than destroy them, all while navigating politics and family drama.
Manga.author: Dasol & Couple Man

Manga.title: The World After the Fall
Manga.description: In a post‑cataclysm world, a mute Wanderer seeks freedom—and power—as he fights increasingly tough bosses to carve a special place in the new order.
Manga.author: Sing Shiong; Kim Moon Gul

Manga.title: Shadow of the Supreme
Manga.description: A young cultivator’s body is possessed by the disciple of a Supreme Lord—he must survive ruthless factions while seeking revenge and power under another’s identity.
Manga.author: Doong Doong; ZZori

Manga.title: Nebula's Civilization
Manga.description: An Earth survivor awakens in a dying alien empire—and uses his knowledge to rebuild a fallen civilization from the brink of extinction.
Manga.author: Tapas & Baek Dong‑sun

Manga.title: The Art of Reincarnation
Manga.description: A painter reincarnates into a cultivation world—and uses his artistic magic to shape destinies, forge bonds, and change the fate of kingdoms.
Manga.author: WU XIAN

Manga.title: The Eminence in Shadow
Manga.description: After his death, Minoru is reborn into a fantasy world as a noble—but his real dream is to be a powerful mastermind hiding in the shadows, creating his own secret cult.
Manga.author: Daisuke Aizawa; Touzai

Manga.title: Lookism
Manga.description: Don‑Kyu Park transfers between twin bodies—one handsome, one overweight—as he navigates high‑school violence, social inequality, and self‑identity.
Manga.author: Tae‑jun Park (Author); Ji‑hyung Kim (Artist)

Manga.title: The Devil Butler
Manga.description: A servant bound to a Master cursed with demonic power—he must guide and restrain him while hiding the truth from a wary world.
Manga.author: Yong‑Chae Kim

Manga.title: The Beginning After the End
Manga.description: Reborn into a magical world as Arthur Leywin, a former king seeks a fresh start—but his royal legacy won’t stay buried for long.
Manga.author: TurtleMe; Fuyuki23

Manga.title: Necromancer, the Ultimate Scourge!
Manga.description: A ruthless rogue is reborn as a necromancer king—and plans to conquer all realms with his undead legions and forbidden magic.
Manga.author: Myunghoon; Seagreen

Manga.title: Pick Me Up
Manga.description: A hairstylist who can perceive clients’ emotional pain uses her gift to heal hearts—and maybe even mend her own broken past.
Manga.author: Chung‐yil

Manga.title: Solo Leveling
Manga.description: Weak hunter Sung Jin‑woo gets rated E-class but awakens to special powers—rising to legendary status as the world’s strongest hunter.
Manga.author: Chugong; DUBU (Redice Studio)

Manga.title: The Extra's Academy Survival Guide
Manga.description: An NPC in a novel realizes he’s just a walking plot device—and fights to rewrite his fate at a magic academy where extras belong at the bottom of society.
Manga.author: Park Hee‑koong

Manga.title: Omniscient Reader's Viewpoint
Manga.description: Kim Dok‑ja, the only reader of a web novel about to become reality, uses his meta-knowledge to survive—and change—the world’s story.
Manga.author: Sing Shiong; Sleepy-C

Manga.title: The Constellations Are My Disciples
Manga.description: Reborn 300 years later in the body of a 17‑year‑old, Hyeon‑oh Kim discovers his former disciples have become Constellations—now he must find and retrain them.
Manga.author: Indoor Kim & Cha Ji‑woon (story), INUS (art)

Manga.title: The Stellar Swordmaster
Manga.description: Street‑smart Vlad wields a sentient sword in a corrupt town—guided by the blade’s wisdom, he rises through swordsmanship and intrigue.
Manga.author: Hong Dae‑Ui (adaptation), Q10 (original novel), art by juno

Manga.title: The Knight King Who Returned with a God
Manga.description: A fallen knight returns wielding divine powers granted by a dying god—with a mission to reclaim his kingdom and protect the innocent.
Manga.author: Eonhee & DOKMI

Manga.title: Latna Saga: Survival of a Sword King
Manga.description: Ryu Han‑bin, trapped in a broken system, spends over 20 years in tutorial purgatory—then escapes as the stealthiest, deadliest sword king in the realm.
Manga.author: Kyungbae Lim (novel), Soon‑Q Kwon (art)

Manga.title: Enrolling in the Transcendent Academy
Manga.description: A prodigy enters a magic academy for the transcendent, only to uncover hidden politics, ancient secrets, and his own forgotten power.
Manga.author: Water My Heart

Manga.title: 66,666 Years; Advent of the Dark Mage
Manga.description: After awakening from a 66,666‑year slumber, the Dark Mage returns to a world he helped shape—with vengeance and arcane mastery.
Manga.author: Lee Jae‑Hyuk

Manga.title: Dungeon Odyssey
Manga.description: Enter a world of shifting dungeons, rogue adventurers, and hidden bosses—where one hunter fights to survive, power up, and uncover his destiny.
Manga.author: Hwang Dong‑Su

Manga.title: Eleceed
Manga.description: Kind‑hearted Jiwoo and secret‑agent cat Kayden team up to protect the world from rogue awakened—mixing action, comedy, and heartfelt moments.
Manga.author: Son Je‑Ho (story), ZHENA (art)

Manga.title: Lout of Count's Family
Manga.description: Transported into a novel as the loutish adopted son of a count, he uses cunning and hidden talents to survive and shake up aristocratic society.
Manga.author: Ryūrei & Yongje Park

Manga.title: Return of the Mad Demon
Manga.description: Once the fearsome Demon Lord, he’s reincarnated into a peaceful life—but old instincts and powers awaken, threatening both enemies and loved ones.
Manga.author: Han‑gyeong Woo

Manga.title: God of War
Manga.description: In ancient China, the rise of a lowborn military genius threatens dynasties. Armed with strategy and martial might, he becomes the God of War.
Manga.author: Kim Sung Jae (story), Park Jin Hwan (art)

Manga.title: The Frozen Player Returns
Manga.description: Seo Jun-ho, once Korea’s top player, wakes up after 25 years frozen in ice. The world has changed—and the monsters are back.
Manga.author: Jong-Seok Yoon (novel), Silvery (art)

Manga.title: The Player Who Can't Level Up
Manga.description: Kim Gi‑gyu awakens as a player—but remains stuck at Level 1. To uncover why, he embarks on a journey of growth, swords, and spirits.
Manga.author: GaVinGe (novel), Park Jungjae (art)

Manga.title: A Returner's Magic Should Be Special
Manga.description: Desir Arman, one of six survivors of the Shadow World, returns to the past. This time, he'll gather allies and save humanity.
Manga.author: Sun-Wook Jeon (novel), Usonan (art)

Manga.title: Mythic Item Obtained
Manga.description: Jaehyun finds a hidden quest and gains a mythical item. From zero to hero, he begins a journey to overturn fate.
Manga.author: Hurry Up Studio

Manga.title: The Novel's Extra
Manga.description: Waking up as a side character in a novel he wrote, Kim Hajin must rewrite the plot using his knowledge before the world crumbles.
Manga.author: Jeongha (novel), KIM Junghyun (art)

Manga.title: The Lazy Lord Masters the Sword
Manga.description: Airen Ferris, ridiculed for laziness, finds purpose after dreaming of a swordmaster. He picks up a blade to change his destiny.
Manga.author: Doip & Baekwol

Manga.title: Level Up with the Gods
Manga.description: Kim Yu‑Won fails to stop the destruction of the Tower. Given a second chance, he trains with gods to reshape history.
Manga.author: Black Ajin (novel), Maslow (art)

Manga.title: Tower of God
Manga.description: Twenty-Fifth Bam enters the Tower in search of Rachel, facing trials, betrayals, and allies as he climbs to unravel the Tower’s mysteries.
Manga.author: SIU (Lee Jong-hui)

Manga.title: The Academy's Genius Swordsman
Manga.description: Ronald was a failing noble—until he awakens the sword of his ancestors. Now he’s the top swordsman at the academy, facing noble politics and monsters.
Manga.author: Hyungjak (novel), Studio Inus (art)

Manga.title: Return of the Blossoming Blade
Manga.description: The once-dead sword saint of the Mount Hua Sect returns to life 100 years later. He must rebuild the fallen sect and take revenge.
Manga.author: Biga (story), LICO (art)

Manga.title: The Infinite Mage
Manga.description: Shiron, born a slave, becomes the first mage to transcend the limits of magic by exploring a forgotten path of infinity.
Manga.author: Kim Chiwoo (story), LEE Jinwoo (art)

Manga.title: I'm the Max-Level Newbie
Manga.description: Jinhyuk, Korea’s top gaming streamer, wakes up inside his favorite game—but unlike others, he’s already maxed out and ready to dominate.
Manga.author: Maslow & WAN.Z

Manga.title: Log-in Murim
Manga.description: In the modern world, Jin Tae‑Kyung discovers a VR capsule that sends him into the Murim world of martial arts, where actions have real consequences.
Manga.author: Writer MOK (story), MSG (art)

Manga.title: Doom Breaker
Manga.description: Zephyr, humanity’s last warrior, dies fighting the Demon King—but is sent back in time by the gods for a second chance to win.
Manga.author: Blue-Deep

Manga.title: The Legend of the Northern Blade
Manga.description: Jin Mu‑Won, the last inheritor of the Northern Heavenly Sect, fights to avenge his father and uncover the truth behind the martial world's betrayal.
Manga.author: Hae-Min (story), Woogack (art)

Manga.title: Han Daesung, Back From Hell
Manga.description: Han Daesung was dragged into hell during a dungeon outbreak—years later, he returns with the power to shatter the hierarchy of hunters.
Manga.author: Kim Hyeongjun & HONG Daeui

Manga.title: Solo Leveling: Ragnarok
Manga.description: Jinwoo's son takes up the mantle in this direct sequel to Solo Leveling, diving into Norse mythology and S-rank dungeons.
Manga.author: Chugong (original), REDICE Studio

Manga.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
Manga.description: Yuji Itadori becomes the vessel for Sukuna, the King of Curses. To save others, he must become stronger than any curse alive.
Manga.author: Gege Akutami

Manga.title: Mercenary Enrollment
Manga.description: Yu Ijin, once a child mercenary, tries to live a normal life after returning to Korea—but his skills never left him.
Manga.author: YC (story), Rakhyun (art)

Manga.title: My Blasted Reincarnated Life
Manga.description: Hamel dies fighting the Demon Lords—only to reincarnate as the noble Vermouth, with his past life’s memories and a thirst for vengeance.
Manga.author: Park Jungyeol (story), MWU (art)
